items.title: Free agency reset: Predictions for the remaining top 10
items.description: A number of impact players are off the market, but there are still big names to be signed. Where do they fit best?

items.title: Passan's hot stove temperature check: What's next in MLB free agency and on the trade market
items.description: While we wait for the next big moves, here's which offseason areas are red-hot -- and which are ice-cold.

items.title: Rematches, underdogs and chaotic teams -- We've got it all in this CFP first round
items.description: Can this year's CFP match 2024's first round? It certainly won't lack for storylines.

items.title: Even in retirement, Nick Saban's fingerprints are all over the CFP
items.description: Five of the head coaches in the playoff worked under and learned from Alabama's legendary leader.

items.title: 150 prospects, 12 schools, 7 rounds: We stacked players in the CFP by NFL draft stock
items.description: We picked out every CFP player who could factor into the 2026 NFL draft from Round 1 to Round 7.
